cause.description:
Home to members of Labour, socialist and social democratic parties of the world
1. Free Education for All
2. Free Health Care For All
3. A dedication to public services and a fair tax system
4. Anti-racism
5. Peace
6. A belief in the right to collectively organise and form independent trade unions, free from coercion.
7. A clean, safe, sustainable environment
cause.mission: To create a fair, democratic, sustainable society in which social injustice is kept to a minimum.**NOTE**:Money Raised Goes to Amnesty International. VISIT YOUR RESPECTIVE LABOUR PARTY's WEBSITE!!!
cause.name: Labour Parties Of The World
